name: koito
description: Koito is a self hosted media and watch list tracker for anime and shows. It integrates with external databases, keeps track of episodes watched and organizes series, offering a simple interface for managing your watch progress.

features.title: Watch Tracking
features.description: Track anime and TV show viewing progress episode by episode. Never lose your place

features.title: Episode Management
features.description: Mark episodes as watched and track completion status. Monitor viewing progress

features.title: Series Organization
features.description: Organize shows into watching, completed, and plan-to-watch lists. Structure your viewing queue

features.title: Database Integration
features.description: Fetch metadata, cover art, and information from external databases. Rich series details automatically

features.title: Automatic Updates
features.description: Get notified when new episodes are released for tracked series. Stay current with shows

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find new anime and shows to watch with search functionality. Discover content easily

features.title: Rating System
features.description: Rate series and episodes to remember your favorites. Track what you enjoyed

features.title: Statistics
features.description: View watching statistics, time spent, and completion rates. Understand your viewing habits
